sections.name: Contact Information
sections.remark: Note: all information provided throughout this survey should describe the situation as of the date of completion. Future policy initiatives should be listed under Section 9 - Future plans.

items.text: Please provide the name and contact details of the person(s) who is the point of contact for this survey.
Please provide the name and contact details of the primary Regulatory Authority for the telecommunication/ICT sector in your country.
If there is more than one Regulatory Authority, please provide the name and contact details of the secondary Regulator Authority.
Please provide the name and contact details of the main Policy-Maker in charge of telecommunications/ICTs
Please indicate name and address of the sector Ministry (if different from the Policy-Maker)
Please list below other separate regulatory agencies active in the telecommunications/ICT sector:
Who is the Policy-Maker in charge of telecommunications/ICTs?
Please provide the name and contact details of the person(s) who is the point of contact for this survey

sections.name: Legislative Framework
sections.remark: Please note that all legislation provided with a URL will be added to the BDT regulatory library on the TREG website.

items.text: What laws, decrees, legal instruments, or regulations govern the telecommunication, information, communication and media and  broadcasting sectors in your country?
items.remark: By "adding" new fields, you will automatically import references entered in previous years. If field is empty, please complete it with relevant reference.
